title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in the Java editor in Photon, there is a bug where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu should allow the user to add breakpoints and marks, but it is not functioning as expected.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, the expected popup menu does not appear.
EB: The expected behavior is that when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints and marks.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected result is that a popup menu should appear, but it does not.
